div.h2: Leggett ISD will continue to distribute student food
5 day packages on Mondays of each week from
10:00-11:00am in front of Leggett High School.

div.p:
According to Governor Abbott's Order, nothing has changed for Polk County with the exception of the following:
1. April 20th - State Parks can reopen, but visitors must wear masks and there will be no gatherings of more than 5 people.
2. April 22nd - Restrictions on surgeries to loosen; standards on assisted living centers enhanced.
3. April 24th - Retailers are allowed to operate to-go as per Governor Abbott's Order.
4. April 27th - Additional openings to be announced and removing statewide Stay at Home Order to be considered.
On April 30th, Statewide and Countywide Stay at Home Orders are scheduled to expire.

Leggett ISD administration and staff are working hard to ensure that your child receives quality educational remediation from the comfort of your home during the extended break due to the COVID-19. We are attaching math, reading, science, and social studies websites under each grade level PK-6. In grades 7-12, each teacher will be listed under the grade level for them to see the work from that teacher.
Sign up for Emergency text! (Don't forget to resign up if you change your cell number!)
A returntext will ask you to send your name for the message database.

div.span:
Students cannot be on their phones during the instructional day
(7:45 AM-3:25 PM). Phones will be required to be put away and on silent until the end of the school day!

h4.img: We will be collecting Box Tops!!

div.h4: Please Send the collected box tops in an envelope
or baggie with your child anytime! The class with the most box tops will receive

strong.strong: Leggett ISD received a rating ofMet Standards in Accountability Standards ain theElementary Campus, High School Campus and theDistrict and a District letter grade of "B"for 2017/18 scores. TheHigh School received Distinction Designations in ELA/Reading, Mathematics, Comparative Academic Growth, andPostsecondary Readiness and theElementary received aDistinction Designation in ELA/Reading.Take a look at our scores on the websiteathttps://txschools.org/ Congratulations to our staff and students for their hard work toward makingLeggett ISD a showcase for academicexcellence!
